G

Geometry - Class in GIS.geometry
Parent class for the three geometry types.
Geometry(String) - Constructor for class GIS.geometry.Geometry
Constructor sets the value of attributes id and type, Type is specific from the created Geometry and is passed by super("Point/Polyline/Polygon")
getArea() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPolygon
returns the value of attribute area of a Polyline.
getCircumference() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPolygon
returns the value of attribute circumference of a Polyline.
getConnection() - Method in class GIS.filehandling.FileHandler
This method is called when connect button is pressed
getCurrentTransform() - Method in class GIS.drawing.DrawingPanel
Returns the transformation defined by zoom and pan.
getGeometry() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPoint
returns an Ellipse2D object which can be drawn
getGeometry() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPolyline
 
getGeometryAsText() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPoint
write the point so that they can be stored as a string in a DB/CSV and be reconstructed to a Point when loaded.
getGeometryAsText() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPolyline
write the points of a line so that they can be stored as a string in a DB/CSV and be reconstructed to a Point when loaded.
getID() - Method in class GIS.geometry.Geometry
returns the value of the attribute id
getLength() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPolyline
returns the value of attribute length of a Polyline.
getType() - Method in class GIS.geometry.Geometry
returns the value of the attribute type
getX() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPoint
returns X coordinate (the attribute x) (if the attribute is not filled yet, tell the user to use createPoint)
getY() - Method in class GIS.geometry.GISPoint
returns Y coordinate (the attribute y) (if the attribute is not filled yet, tell the user to use createPoint)
GIS - package GIS
Contains the GIS class which generates a new GIS and defines the user interaction and layout.
GIS - Class in GIS
Generates the GIS, serves as connection between user input and functionalities
GIS() - Constructor for class GIS.GIS
Constructor invokes a new Content and DrawingPanel object and its properties.
gis - Static variable in class GIS.GIS
The GIS object which is invoked in the main method
GIS.drawing - package GIS.drawing
Contains classes for drawing functionalities.
GIS.filehandling - package GIS.filehandling
Contains classes for file handling functionalities
GIS.geometry - package GIS.geometry
Contains classes defining the available Geometries Point, Polyline, Polygon.
GISPoint - Class in GIS.geometry
Point Class, inherits from Geometry.
GISPoint() - Constructor for class GIS.geometry.GISPoint
Creates an empty Point Object.
GISPolygon - Class in GIS.geometry
Polygon class, inherits from Polyline.
GISPolygon() - Constructor for class GIS.geometry.GISPolygon
Constructor: because GISPolygon extends from GISPolyline and not from Geometry, the type field of the super.super class can not be acessed (not allowed); The attribute needs to be changed indirectly by calling the setTypeToPolygon() method of the class GISPolyline
GISPolyline - Class in GIS.geometry
Polyline Class, inherits from Geometry.
GISPolyline() - Constructor for class GIS.geometry.GISPolyline
Creates an empty Polyline Object.
